---
title: "SBC on the TCGA-GBM Dataset"
---

This is the website built with the results of the master thesis project: "External validation and characterization of cancer subtypes using SBC ".


1. Results on the Verhaak sample present in the TCGA-GBM Dataset.
2. Results on the whole TCGA-GBM Dataset.
3. Results after correcting sample selection to have more homogeneous Karnofsky Indexes between training and testing.
4. Results after Karnofsky Index Correction and Flexmix Initialization
